In stores that sell armor, weapons and equipment, a dynamic pricing system works.
The system changes the price of goods depending on the day of the serverâ€™s life.
Values of discounts or extra charges by server days: 1 day: +100% (Extra charge) 2 day: +70% (Extra charge) 4 day: +50% (Extra charge) 7 day: +20% (Extra charge) 10 day: 0% 14 day: -20% (Discount) 17-N day: -50% (Discount)
The discount is updated at 17:00 GMT+3
